about_the_game:
The deep Ocean depths is a world unlike any other, and needs a special kind of music to make the unique environment feel real.

Into the Depths Music Pack is a fantastic collection of songs that ellicit the precise sound and feeling of being immersed in the vast wonder and eternal discovery of the ocean depths.

Features:

* 14 royalty-free songs
* ogg, m4a and mp3 file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
